name: Inflation Detection and Response
description: Identifying and mitigating the impact of artificial inflation tactics used to destabilize economies.

cards.title: Spotting Inflation Manipulation Tactics
cards.description: Recognizing how banking cartels and central banks create artificial inflation to extract wealth.
bulletpoints: Understanding the psychological effects of inflation on mass behavior.
Identifying key policy changes that trigger economic instability.
Tracking central bank interest rate manipulations and fiat currency overprinting.

cards.title: Wealth Preservation in Inflationary Periods
cards.description: Tactics for maintaining financial stability during currency devaluation.
bulletpoints: Utilizing hard assets and alternative stores of value (gold, silver, cryptocurrency, etc.).
Diversifying wealth storage across decentralized and resilient financial systems.

cards.title: Community-Based Economic Stability
cards.description: Leveraging local networks to bypass inflation-driven economic control.
bulletpoints: Developing barter and trade systems to resist fiat currency collapse.
Strengthening local food and energy security to reduce reliance on controlled supply chains.
